sentences.sContent: Your body full compliance with the requirements of conscription.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your body full compliance with the requirements of conscription.
sentences.sCn: 你的身体完全符合征兵要求。

sentences.sContent: They were rather earnest about the Tommies, and the threat of conscription, and the shortage of sugar and toffee for the children.
sentences.sContent_eng: They were rather earnest about the Tommies, and the threat of conscription, and the shortage of sugar and toffee for the children.
sentences.sCn: 他们对于军队，对于征兵的恐吓，对于儿童们的糖与糖果的缺乏，是颇郑重其事的。

sentences.sContent: Other sources of extra-budgetary income include funds from the central government and local governments for defense mobilization preparations, conscription, and demobilization.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other sources of extra-budgetary income include funds from the central government and local governments for defense mobilization preparations, conscription, and demobilization.
sentences.sCn: 其他预算外进项来源包括来自中央和地方用于防卫动员的准备工作、征兵以及复员安排的资金。

remMethod.val: 来自conscript(v. 征兵， 征募)

trans.tranOther: when people are made to join the army, navy etc
